article_text:
$80 million on Iron Man suit

The DoD is pouring millions into a wearable weapon it calls the Tactical Assault Light Operator Suit (TALOS) otherwise known as the “Iron Man” suit. Some scientists think that someone at the Pentagon has been watching too many movies.
article_summary:
$80 million on Iron Man suitThe DoD is pouring millions into a wearable weapon it calls the Tactical Assault Light Operator Suit (TALOS) otherwise known as the “Iron Man” suit.
Some scientists think that someone at the Pentagon has been watching too many movies.
